about.summary: Provides seamless access to the 'QGIS' (<https://qgis.org/en/site/>) processing toolbox using the standalone 'qgis_process' command-line utility.  Both native and third-party (plugin) processing providers are supported.  Beside referring data sources from file, also common objects from 'sf', 'terra' and 'stars' are supported. The native processing algorithms are documented by QGIS.org (2023) <https://docs.qgis.org/latest/en/docs/user_manual/processing_algs/>.

Provides seamless access to the 'QGIS' (<https://qgis.org/en/site/>) processing toolbox using the standalone 'qgis_process' command-line utility.  Both native and third-party (plugin) processing providers are supported.  Beside referring data sources from file, also common objects from 'sf', 'terra' and 'stars' are supported. The native processing algorithms are documented by QGIS.org (2023) <https://docs.qgis.org/latest/en/docs/user_manual/processing_algs/>.

name: r-qgisprocess
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.1.0' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-qgisprocess
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/qgisprocess_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/qgisprocess/qgisprocess_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 593a4a52131892306aabe9b298d33057c59d681fa0301fba8d0e136dbe55ae1c

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 1
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-assertthat
    - r-glue
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-processx >=3.5.2
    - r-rappdirs
    - r-rlang
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble
    - r-vctrs
    - r-withr

  run:
    - r-base
    - r-assertthat
    - r-glue
    - r-jsonlite
    - r-processx >=3.5.2
    - r-rappdirs
    - r-rlang
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble
    - r-vctrs
    - r-withr
    - qgis >=3.28

test:
  requires:
    - r-testthat
    - r-raster
    - r-rgdal
    - r-sf
    - r-stars
    - r-terra
    # Following CDTs are from `qgis` feedstock test section
    - {{ cdt('xorg-x11-proto-devel') }}  # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libx11-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxext-devel') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxrender-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libgl-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-libegl-devel') }}     # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('mesa-dri-drivers') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxau-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('alsa-lib-devel') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('gtk2-devel') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('gtkmm24-devel') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libdrm-devel') }}          # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcomposite-devel') }}   # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcursor-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxi-devel') }}           # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxrandr-devel') }}       # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('pciutils-devel') }}        # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxscrnsaver-devel') }}   # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxtst-devel') }}         # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libselinux-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxdamage-devel') }}      # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxfixes') }}             # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxfixes-devel') }}       # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxxf86vm') }}            # [linux]
    - {{ cdt('libxcb') }}                # [linux]
  source_files:
    - tests/
  commands:
    #- qgis_process --help
    - $R -e "library('qgisprocess')"                                         # [not win]
    - $R -e "testthat::test_file('tests/testthat.R', stop_on_failure=TRUE)"  # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('qgisprocess')\""                                         # [win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"testthat::test_file('tests/testthat.R', stop_on_failure=TRUE)\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://r-spatial.github.io/qgisprocess/
  dev_url: https://github.com/r-spatial/qgisprocess
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: Provides seamless access to the 'QGIS' (<https://qgis.org/en/site/>) processing toolbox
    using the standalone 'qgis_process' command-line utility.  Both native and third-party
    (plugin) processing providers are supported.  Beside referring data sources from
    file, also common objects from 'sf', 'terra' and 'stars' are supported. The native
    processing algorithms are documented by QGIS.org (2023) <https://docs.qgis.org/latest/en/docs/user_manual/processing_algs/>.
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - thewchan

# Description: Provides seamless access to the 'QGIS' (<https://qgis.org/en/site/>) processing toolbox using the standalone 'qgis_process' command-line utility.  Both native and third-party (plugin) processing providers are supported.  Beside referring data sources from file, also common objects from 'sf', 'terra' and 'stars' are supported. The native processing algorithms are documented by QGIS.org (2023) <https://docs.qgis.org/latest/en/docs/user_manual/processing_algs/>.
